sourcesContent:
<select class="search" name="heroes" id="hereos" s>
        <option *ngFor="let hero of suggestedHeroes" routerLink="/detail/{{hero.id}}">{{hero.name}} value="{{hero.id}}">{{hero.name}}</option>
    </select>

import { Component } from '@angular/core';
import { HeroService } from '../hero.service';
import { Hero } from '../heroes/hero';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-search-bar',
  templateUrl: './search-bar.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./search-bar.component.css']
})
export class SearchBarComponent {
  suggestedHeroes: Hero[] = [];
  key? : string;

  constructor(private heroService:HeroService ){}

  ngOnInit(): void {     
    this.sendData(this.key);
  }

  sendData(event: any){
    const key = event.target.value;
     const suggestedHeroes = this.heroService.getSuggestedHeroes(key)
    .subscribe(suggestedHeroes => this.suggestedHeroes= suggestedHeroes );
    return suggestedHeroes;
  }
  


}
